attributes.action: create fair pricing policies to prevent banks pricing interemdiaries out of the market
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mortgage lenders - a prime example being where tax payers money has been injected  - creating unfair price discrimination and product availablity for intermediaries, resulting in less independent advice in the market place and further burden on employment/unemployment and small businesses closing. Ultimately this will effect the tax payer more, does not impress the general public and promotes greater dissatisfaction with the government.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to create fair pricing policies to prevent banks pricing interemdiaries out of the market.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Mtg-Dual-Pricing


Her Majesty's Government
